comment.author: 82609930@N06
comment._content:
This is Carol M. Highsmith.  I spent many long hours in the Library of Congress Thomas Jefferson Building photographing the art.  One morning, I looked out the window and there was a beautiful view of the Capitol.  I quickly set up lights and captured the shot.  I worked in the Thomas Jefferson Building for two years documenting all the art on the walls.
I am donating my collection copyright-free.

comment.author: 35659506@N02
comment._content: I am curious about the rest of quotation from Confucius and the meaning of mural by Charles Sprague Pearce.

comment.author: 63860770@N07
comment._content: The quote says "Give instruction unto those who cannot procure it for themselves." I'm unsure about any meaning behind the mural.
